sentence: Looking at the universe of stocks we cover at Dividend Channel , on 5/30/17, Home Depot Inc (Symbol: HD), Group 1 Automotive, Inc. (Symbol: GPI), and Sinclair Broadcast Group Inc (Symbol: SBGI) will all trade ex-dividend for their respective upcoming dividends.

Home Depot Inc will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.89 on 6/15/17, Group 1 Automotive, Inc. will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.24 on 6/15/17, and Sinclair Broadcast Group Inc will pay its quarterly dividend of $0.18 on 6/15/17.

As a percentage of HD's recent stock price of $155.81, this dividend works out to approximately 0.57%, so look for shares of Home Depot Inc to trade 0.57% lower - all else being equal - when HD shares open for trading on 5/30/17.
Similarly, investors should look for GPI to open 0.40% lower in price and for SBGI to open 0.55% lower, all else being equal.
Below are dividend history charts for HD, GPI, and SBGI, showing historical dividends prior to the most recent ones declared.
In general, dividends are not always predictable, following the ups and downs of company profits over time.
Therefore, a good first due diligence step in forming an expectation of annual yield going forward, is looking at the history above, for a sense of stability over time.
This can help in judging whether the most recent dividends from these companies are likely to continue.
If they do continue, the current estimated yields on annualized basis would be 2.28% for Home Depot Inc, 1.60% for Group 1 Automotive, Inc., and 2.18% for Sinclair Broadcast Group Inc.
In Friday trading, Home Depot Inc shares are currently down about 0.4%, Group 1 Automotive, Inc. shares are off about 1.2%, and Sinclair Broadcast Group Inc shares are off about 1.1% on the day.
